cardName: Star Serpent of the Celestial Abyss
prompt: An awe-inspiring image of a colossal cosmic serpent, with a body made of swirling stardust and shimmering celestial scales. Its eyes are glowing orbs of pure cosmic energy, and it coils around distant stars, twisting and flickering with mystical light. The background showcases a vast galaxy with radiant nebulas and cascading shooting stars. This scene captures both grandeur and ethereal beauty, emphasizing the serpent's immense power and otherworldly nature.
